DOC.brief_summary: This study include behavioral educational intervention focus healthy eating , physical activity glucose management pregnancy post partum among woman newly diagnose gestational diabetes mellitus ( GDM ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Transgenerational e-Intervention Gestational Diabetics Their Offspring
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot trial 50 woman newly diagnose gestational diabetes randomize either one two group : 1 ) active internet intervention 2 ) Usual Care ( Self-directed ) educational intervention . The primary pregnancy outcome change A1C . The primary postpartum outcome weight .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed gestational diabetes Confirmed singleton pregnancy 2432 week gestation age Planning deliver within study area Preexisting diabetes ( type 1 2 ) Nonenglish speak Not plan deliver study area
